newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle sales active $110/drsed -trade.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle sales active $110/drsed -trade.

text.p: Nebraska feedlot cattle sold at $110.00 per cwt on a dressed basis in active trading, market sources said.
The price was steady with light activity on Tuesday and steady to down $1.00 from the bulk of last week's sales, market sources said.
There also were light trades at $111.00 for cattle that will likely grade "very choice", one source said.
About 30,000 head had sold as of midday Wednesday, with more expected, sources said. Bids at $68.00 on a live basis were also reported but no sales had occured yet, they said.
